duties_responsibilities.duty: Support protocol events and products, protocol advice and counsel, and visitor support.
Work directly with General Officer/Flag Officer, O-6/GS-15 level executives supporting the USSPACECOM Commander.
Provide support for Distinguished Visitors, meetings, events, and ceremonies as required by the protocol director.
Lead the protocol planning for all events involving the CDR/DCDR/COS/CSEL to include events, visits, meetings, ceremonies, conferences, and provide appropriate guidance to assigned action officers.

Create and provide high-quality Protocol (CCP) event products (nametags, table tents, food tags, seat tags, seating charts, parking signs, etc.) to appropriately accommodate the meetings and hosted events for USSPACECOM.
Analyzing situations and making well-informed decisions.

education_certification.credential: Experience working within the construct of USAF Instruction 34-1201, Protocol and AF Pamphlet 34-1202, Guide to Protocol. Perfect Table training is preferred.
